text:
:wave: Hello, team!

Any one know how to edit the code default password reset in private content. I want to add css in this email.  I create new cloned password reset email. but, dynamic code not working in new template.
which code editors do you use when working with HTML, CSS and Hubl? I've used PHPStorm for PHP/Laravel and VS Code for other projects. any recs?
I use vscode (if you're using prettier make sure to also install "@HubSpot/prettier-plugin-hubl")
